title: Financial Analyst
about_the_role: Join our Financial Services team as a Financial Analyst. You will support financial planning and analysis activities, providing insights to drive business performance.
key_responsibilities: Assist in the preparation of financial reports and forecasts. Analyze financial data to identify trends and variances. Collaborate with business units to support decision-making. Ensure compliance with financial regulations and standards. Support ad-hoc financial analysis and projects.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field. 0-2 years of experience in financial analysis or related roles. Strong analytical and quantitative skills. Proficiency in Excel and financial modeling. Fluency in English and Portuguese required.
